moves.1. d4: The second game between me and bowlem. I lost the first one and I tried to equalize with this game.
moves.4. a4: An interesting answer to the Benko Gambit
moves.5... d6 6. Nf3: if 6.Bxf6, then 6.exf6 followed by Be7 and O-O gives black a solid defense and a good square for the rook
moves.16. Bh2 Nf4 17. Bxf4 exf4: opens the a1-h8 diagonal for the bishop
moves.20... Be5: " The position is about to explode!" 20. ... fxg3!? 21.fxg3 Bd4  and White is lost, because 22.Kh1 is answered by h4! and 22.Kh2 gxh3  doesn't help anyway.
moves.21. gxf4 Bxf4 22. Rfe1: perhaps the sacrifice e5!? would have held the fort some moves longer...
moves.25. Bc2 g3 26. fxg3 Bxg3 27. Nxg3 Rxg3+: a nice finish and White has to sacrifice his Queen, because of 29. ... Bf3.
